headline.main: CONSUMER NOTES; Vegetable Grades Have Varied Uses

docs.abstract: Counsumer Reports pub warns that 7 typical fingernail polish and strengtheners may catch fire even after they are dry; finds Max Factor Stronghold Long Nail product to be unusually flammable; Max Factor spokesman says 'appropriate steps' will be taken after probe (S)
docs.lead_paragraph: Marketing specialists of the United States Department of Agriculture contend that if consumers use the canned and frozen vegetable grades they can save money:
